Articles.Content:
I Need help, i want to make a mod for ksp 1.4.2 to Change Spacesuit by click on the coat hanger icon in the astronout complex or the crew to make it realy simpe to Change.

i have issues to find the stock spacesuit textures or a cfg to add some, like the historial spacesuit

who have time and fun to help?

there is already a mod called texture replacer or texture replacer replaced/continued/reborn/reincarnated/rises again....... 

guess you could change the icon on your local copy from the lil dude with a beard to a coat hanger and you're done.
thats not that whati mean, this mod words slightly different, i want to add alternative spacesuits to the stock way to Change suites

On 4/16/2018 at 12:47 PM, Shaymes said:

thats not that whati mean, this mod words slightly different, i want to add alternative spacesuits to the stock way to Change suites

Did you ever discorver a way to do this?  I really love the coathangar feature, its elegant and just works.  I would love to be able to add more suit colors to it.
